projectGridLines.title: Customer Success Reporting
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The interns would be required to work with the customer success team

and make cold calls with clients. They would be updating the converted clients with

the onboarding process and assisting them in the process. They would also be

required to do continuous reporting of the process for the other teams.

Skill sets: Reporting, cold calling, logistics and supply chain industry, management

Traits expectation: Good communication skills

Expected learning: Students would learn about the important aspects of

professional communication and reporting. They would be working with different

teams and that will teach crucial organization basics.

Specific courses required for project execution: Reporting and Writing for Media,

Financial Management, Fundamentals of Finance and Accounting, Derivatives and

Risk Management, Financial Risk Analytics and Management, Business Analysis

and Valuation, Security Analysis and Portfolio Management
